meanings.sent1: The genisteins in the jar caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: She added genisteins to her smoothie for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The genisteins decided to have a party in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The genisteins in the garden danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The genisteins sparkled like tiny jewels in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Genisteins: a type of isoflavone found in plants
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the effects of genisteins on health.
meanings.sent2: Many legumes contain genisteins as a natural compound.
meanings.sent3: The genisteins in the salad whispered secrets to the lettuce.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the genisteins blooming in the field.
meanings.sent5: The genisteins painted a colorful picture in the meadow.
